transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan. Rohit ji main Rukhsar baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir, hamare paas ek aapka concern aaya hua tha, usi se related hame aapka discussion karna hai actually.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aapka ek email aaya hua hai jisme email mein aapne likha hai no best. Iske aage kuch nahi likha hua hai. Mujhe pata hai kya aap. Sirf no best likha hua hai. Email jo aapki side se aaya hai. RK Agro farm se aaya hua hai.
Customer: Haan, side sahi hai. Side ek bhi buylead nahi mil rahi, mujhe achi buylead nahi mil rahi kuch bhi.
Executive: Achchi buylead nahi mil rahi aapko IndiaMART se?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aaj aapne buylead consume ki hai koi?
Customer: Nahi, aaj to nahi ki.
Executive: Okay. To sir achchi ka terms mein samjhi nahi matlab customer ROI. Buylead nahi aa rahi hai mere paas mein, nahi buylead ka option bata raha hai, buylead kitni use aa gayi, kitni khatam ho gayi.
Executive: Matlab?
Customer: Buylead kitni chali gayi, kitni aa gayi.
Executive: Buylead point ki baat kar rahe hain aap ki buylead aapki kitni. Buylead ki nahi bol raha hoon main, buylead kitni khatam ho chuki hai madam.
Executive: Haan, points aapke kitne khatam ho chuke hain ye puch rahi hoon main.
Customer: Haan, waha pe batata hi nahi hai kuch bhi option nahi batata waha pe pata nahi.
Executive: Sir, agar aap transaction history mein jaake dekhenge apne buyleads ki, to waha aap easily dekh payenge. Aap buyleads mein jayenge. Agar aap system se use karte hain ya mobile se sir?
Customer: Kya karte hain?
Executive: Aap IndiaMART use kaise karte hain? System se karte hain ya mobile se karte hain?
Customer: Mobile mein. Computer laptop.
Executive: Mobile mein karte hain. Theek hai. Mobile mein bhi wahi pe option aata hai right side pe buyer ye aap yaha par aata hai dekhiye balance. Balance karke aata hai us pe aap click karenge to aapko dikhega no buylead available hai aapke paas mein.
Customer: Haan, wahi to bol raha hoon. Buylead utha hi nahi pa raha hoon main, buylead hoegi to uthaunga na.
Executive: Theek hai. Main dekh leti hoon. Aaj to aapne koi buylead nahi hai aapke sab matlab li lekin aapne 23rd ko teen buyleads li thi. Ek ka naam tha Sumra Ali. Sumra Arif A, ek tha Shambhu Barman, ek tha Ravi. Ye teen buyleads thi. Kya sir kya raha inka feedback?
Customer: Abhi tak koi response nahi hai inki taraf se bol rahe batate hain.
Executive: Theek hai. Aapne 22 November ko ek sath teen, che, nau buylead consume kari hai. 22 November ko ek sath nau buylead.
Customer: Sir madam wo to Sunday ko change ho jati hai na return.
Executive: Sunday ko wapas 17 buylead mil jati hai na, 10 alag se daily bonus ek.
Customer: Haan, haan. 10 milti hain aur daily bonus milta hai ek.
Customer: Haan to aaj to Mangalwar hi hua na phir.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap keh rahe hain to main buyleads aapke kehne pe filter laga deti hoon. Mujhe bataye aap India level pe business karte hain ya Rajasthan hai sir?
Customer: India India.
Executive: India maine select kiya hai. Theek hai main recent pe aayi hoon. Abhi jo sabse upar mere paas buylead ek dikh rahi hai wo hai all type of goats. Sab tarike ki goats ki requirement hai 18 piece.
Customer: Minimum 50 piece, 30 piece se kam nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Minimum 50?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Lekin jo maine abhi aapko bataya hai 18 piece isme bhi order value ek se do lakh ki hai.
Customer: To 18 piece do lakh ke thodi aa jayenge madam. Wo to aise hi dal dete jisko IndiaMARTs barabar se chalana nahi aata.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo jinki maine buyleads padh ke aapko batai hai customer ne hum char saal se hamare sath hai aur wo kharidte hain hamare paas. Unhone isse pehle pet goats karke bhi kuch kharida hai wo aksar bakre yaha se kharidte hain hamare paas se. Matlab sara hai yaha par. Agar aap open karenge apna IndiaMART main aapko bata sakti hoon aapne kaise dekhni hai kaise aap judge kar sakte hain leads ko. Agar aap open karenge apna IndiaMART buyleads mein jayenge waha pe location mein aap filter lagayenge India ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Filter lagaya aapne India?
Customer: Haan, India ka filter lagane ke baad mein aap recent pe jaiye. Recent.
Customer: IndiaMART kholna padega kya phone mein?
Executive: Haan haan bilkul aap IndiaMART open kariye apna.
Customer: Ek minute madam ruko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Haan login kar liya.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek main aapke phone agar aap mobile app mein jayenge left side pe. Madam mere phone chalu rahega to isme chal hi nahi raha net hi dusre phone pe phone karo.
Executive: Sir dusra phone kaun se number pe call karu dusre?
Customer: 8058506236.
Executive: Ek ek ek second ek second. Ah haan bataye 80 58 8058 50 8058 50 62 6062 60 nahi 62 62 okay 36 36 36 haan.
Executive: Theek hai main call karti hoon is number pe. Do minute dijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting good quality buyleads.

- Unable to see buylead consumption details.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check transaction history.

- Executive offered to filter buyleads.

- Executive will call on another number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on alternate number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filter, transaction history
